mission.posting: Join the conjoint op "TakeDown" with fSociety to shutdown the ECorp network

email.subject: OP TakeDown - Offline Backup
email.body:
#PLAYERNAME#,
They must have some offline backup ... You need to figure out the IP address of their offline backup service ! Terry Colby, ECorp CTO, he may have the IP on his personnal computer or eOS Device...
Reply with the IP when you're done.
-fSociety

attachments.note: Goals : - Find and gain admin access on Colby personnal devices - Find the IP address of Steel Mountains Backup - Reply with the IP address
